ObjectClass.Name: Scout Guardian
ObjectClass.Description:
SCOUT GUARDIAN: Non-achronal minor Guardian Resource generator and basic enclave-defense shell
Produces Power and Q-Plasma (+4/s) + 500 every 180s for 9 minutes
Can spawn Spider Probe suicide scouts

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 60, R 32, SR 2, Sta S\Air: 60, R 32, SR 2, Sta S

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Hierarchy
Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Spawn Spider Probe
Objective.Details: Spawn a temporary scout probe\Agile but easy destroyed \40s lifespan\ \Upgrade Specials Tech: suicide attack

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter\ Must not have a TSS

ObjectClass.Name: Spider Probe
ObjectClass.Description:
Spider Probe: Disposable recon probe Use for espionage, scouting, or sabotage
Self destructs after 40s Upgrade Specials Tech for suicide attack

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 6, MaxInc: 60\Vision Range: 22, Aggro Radius: 18 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: \Suicide attack, requires Specials Tech \ \Gnd Damage: 50-70 R: 4 SR: 8

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter\ Must not have a TSS
